Can't get enough of this game!

First game I've found "fun" in years.
Not toxic community. Killer main approved

Fun game... for the most part. different types of killers which allows for a different experience every time. survivors are fun as well. Game is VERY grindy considering you have to get perks for certain killers and for the survivors as well. recommend playing it with friends to have a better time <3

Edit: almost 600 hours in the game, and i can honestly say its the worst game you can have in your library :). save yourself some cash and go order some nice food.

Edit 2: still the worst game you can have in your library :)
Very fun game mainly when your playing as a survivor. Running away from the hunter while scared is really fun. Its not that scary. A perfect amount of scariness. For sure recommend.
game makes me piss my pants oh my lord pissy pants
super fun to play with friends, recommended
milhares de horas para deixar um killer full, tenso
killers toxic and camping all the time
Juego totalmente recomendado para jugar con amigos y tener funnys moments

Game is fun especially with friends but after a few hundred hours and seeing the way the devs handle updates/ the decisions they make for this game you're realize why the community is so toxic and the game feels like it's going down the drain.

This game is one of the best ive played. I have 721 hrs. What i love about this game is that theres So many people to play as and so many different things, You can run a meta build, A meme build, and a noob build.

I love this game.  it takes some practice (like anything), but it's easy to get into.  It's a great "quick" game; you don't have to invest hours running through dungeons, raids, or expeditions.
i love this game, its so fun and interesting. i love learning the ways to avoid new killers and main new survivors.. if your thinking about getting this game, its 100% worth it !!!

I have played this game for about 30 hours now and got it last week even though it is 5 years old still an amazing game to play with friends or even by yourself. If you are hesitating don't it is worth the $20. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
I loved this game, scary and spooky, unique in it genre...
El juego es divertido siempre y cuando el asesino no te quede mirando cuando te cuelga.
It is a fun game. Lots of stradegy required. Reccomend playing with friends because you will lose a lot if you dont
This game is good for passing the time.

I love the concept in general, the lore is awesome, the original killers and survivors are so creative and we also have licensed characters which makes this even cooler. I recommend it for any horror fan but don't take this game as a competitive one, it's not. It's based on RNG so just have fun & ignore the meanies! :D ‚ô•‚ò∫
